title: The Recompense - poem as a whole

content.prompt: The poem as a whole can best be understood as

choices.label: a tribute to ordinary people whose noteworthy deeds have been overlooked
an offer of consolation to those who experience repeated setbacks
a reflection on the parallels between natural processes and the progress of civilization
an expression of amazement at natureâ€™s seemingly countless mysteries

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
